src:
Hasil Pertandingan Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan: Skor 3-2
06 Nov 2019, 05:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund berhasil menuai kemenangan dramatis saat menjamu Inter Milan di markasnya, Westfalenstadion, dalam laga lanjutan fase grup Liga Champions hari Rabu (6/11/2019). Klub raksasa Jerman itu menang dengan skor tipis 3-2.
Hasil tersebut membuat Dortmund berhasil naik satu peringkat ke posisi dua dengan raihan tujuh poin. Sementara itu, Inter Milan tergeser ke peringkat ketiga dengan raihan empat poin saja.
Bermain sebagai tamu tidak membuat Inter gentar. Malah sebaliknya, mereka justru berhasil unggul lebih dulu melalui gol Lautaro Martinez pada menit ke-5. Pemain asal Argentina itu sukses menjebol gawang Dortmund setelah bekerja sama dengan Romelu Lukaku. 1-0.
Dortmund langsung bereaksi. Pada menit ke-20, mereka sempat menciptakan peluang melalui tembakan Mario Gotze. Sayangnya, Samir Handanovic masih terlalu tangguh untuk ditaklukkan. Bola hasil tepisan meluncur ke arah Nico Schulz yang langsung melancarkan peluang tambahan, sayang ia gagal membidik sasaran dengan baik.
Tiang! Inter nyaris menambah keunggulan andai Romelu Lukaku bisa membidik gawang Dortmund dengan baik pada menit ke-23. Sayangnya tembakan pria asal Belgia itu hanya mampu membentur tiang gawang.
Setelah melancarkan serangkaian serangan, gol kedua Inter Milan akhirnya datang juga. Permainan operan yang apik membuat bola menghampiri Antonio Candreva. Mantan pemain Lazio itu kemudian memberikan umpan ke Matias Vecino yang lepas dari pengawalan pemain Dortmund. Tanpa ragu, ia mencetak gol kedua Inter.
Pertandingan berlanjut hingga wasit mengakhiri babak pertama. Sejauh ini, Nerazzurri masih dalam keadaan unggul dengan skor 2-0.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Results of the match Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan: Score 3-2
Nov 6, 2019, 05:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund managed to reap a dramatic victory when entertaining Inter Milan at its headquarters, Westfalenstadion, in a continued match in the Champions League group phase on Wednesday (6/11/2019). The German giants won by a score of 3-2.
These results make Dortmund managed to move up one place to second place with seven points. Meanwhile, Inter Milan moved to third place with only four points.
Playing as a guest does not make Inter flinch. On the contrary, they actually succeeded in winning first through Lautaro Martinez's goal in the 5th minute. The Argentine was successful in breaking down the Dortmund goal after working with Romelu Lukaku. 1-0.
Dortmund react immediately. In the 20th minute, they had created chances through Mario Gotze's shot. Unfortunately, Samir Handanovic is still too strong to be conquered. The resulting ball slid towards Nico Schulz who immediately launched an additional opportunity, unfortunately he failed to hit the target properly.
Pole! Inter almost added advantage if Romelu Lukaku could aim Dortmund goal well in the 23rd minute. Unfortunately the Belgian man's shot was only able to hit the goalpost.
After launching a series of attacks, Inter Milan's second goal finally came. A neat pass, the ball approaches Antonio Candreva. The former Lazio player then gave a pass to Matias Vecino who escaped from the Dortmund players escort. Without a doubt, he scored Inter's second goal.
The match continues until the referee ends the first round. So far, the Nerazzurri are still in a superior condition with a score of 2-0.
